title: Butterfly Café
description: In Butterfly Café a young girl prepares a "café" for future monarch butterflies to visit. The stages of plant development are briefly told through the narration. Detailed illustrations support the text.
meta: café, customers, milkweed, monarch, nectar, plant, shelter, soil, sprouts
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand text
Sequence Events : Identify the sequence of events in a story
Present-Tense Verbs : Recognize and correctly use present-tense verbs in a sentence
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word our

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
